snippet: The confession by the suspect, Pedro Hernandez, in May upended three decades of investigations into other leads into the killing of Etan Patz.
abstract: Grand jury in Manhattan begins hearing evidence against Pedro Hernandez, man who confessed to killing Etan Patz in 1979; is first direct indication that prosecutors have decided to move forward with a murder prosecution after months of investigating the validity of Hernandez's claims.
lead_paragraph: The confession by the suspect, Pedro Hernandez, in May upended three decades of investigations into other leads into the killing of Etan Patz.

headline.seo: Case of Patz Killing Suspect Goes to Grand Jury
headline.main: Grand Jury Gets Evidence on Suspect in Patz Killing
headline.print_headline: Grand Jury Gets Evidence On Suspect In Patz Killing
